flawed_nl_solution:
In a week, Elliot will read 20 x 7 = <<20*7=140>>140 pages.
Adding the prior readings, he has read a total of 149 + 140 = <<149+140=298>>298 pages.
There are 381 - 298 = <<381-298=83>>83 pages still left to be read.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 289, not 298. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
